monopoly-help:
Run `{0}monopoly join` to join a game.
Run `{0}monopoly leave` to leave.
Run `{0}monopoly start` to vote to start the game.
start-desc: Vote to start the game of Monopoly
give-desc: Give something you own to someone else. If not specified, gives your Get Out of Jail Free card. Specify a number to give money.
no-goj: You do not have a Get Out of Jail Free card.
not-in-game: You are not in a game of Monopoly!
not-enough-money: You do not have enough money for this action.
goj-given: your Get Out of Jail Free card
rent-paid: You have paid **{0}** bits in rent for landing on `{1}`.
own-prop: `{0}` is your own property - nothing happens.
passed-go: You have passed GO and collected 200 bits.
use-goj?-title: Use Get Out of Jail Free Card?
use-goj?: Do you want to use your Get Out of Jail Free card?
jail-fine: Do you want to pay 50 bits to get out of jail?
buy-prop?: `{0}` is for sale! Do you want to buy it?
rolled: Rolled a **{0}** and a **{1}**. Your current net worth is **{2}** bits.
nothing-happens: You landed on `{0}`. Nothing happens here.
tax-paid: You landed on `{0}` and paid **{1}** bits.
nitro-3: Someone gifts you nitro. Collect 50 bits.
nitro-4: Get unbanned for free. This may be kept until needed or traded/sold.
nitro-5: Get banned. Do not login, do not collect 200 bits.
nitro-6: Host PAX East. Collect 50 bits from every player for tickets.
nitro-9: Host PAX West. Collect 10 bits from every player for tickets.
nitro-10: Your sibling quits Discord and gives you their account. Collect 100 bits.
nitro-14: Grant amnesty. Pay 40 bits for each mute, 115 for each kick.
nitro-15: You win a giveaway of 10 bits.
nitro-16: You blackmail a staff member out of 100 bits for hiding the furries.
someone-1: View #giveaways. If you need to login, collect 200 bits.
someone-2: Join general voice. If you need to login, collect 200 bits.
someone-3: Meet&greet the nearest Discord team. If unowned, you may buy them. If owned, pay them 10 times another dice roll.
someone-4: Read the nearest release notes and pay the owner twice the normal rent. If unowned, you may buy it.
someone-7: Get unbanned for free. This may be kept until needed or traded/sold.
someone-9: Get banned. Do not login, do not collect 200 bits.
someone-10: Finish being salty. For each mute pay 25 bits, for each kick pay 100 bits.
someone-12: Read the Alpha release notes. If you need to login, collect 200 bits.
someone-14: HypeSquad event. Pay each player 50 bits.
someone-15: Muted people try to bribe you. Collect 150 bits.
